title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dreams.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: GoodFellas
description: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian kid who is adopted by neighborhood gangsters and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the reality he lives in is a simulation.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a man with a low IQ who influences major historical events.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household.

title: Movie Rental System
description: Featured Movies

title: Jurassic Park
description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
